adjective.description: Having a stiff, erect, and apparently arrogant or conceited gait.
examples: the king marches in with a strutting military escort
his use of the word is part of his strutting pretense

noun.description: The action of walking with a stiff, erect, and apparently arrogant or conceited gait.
examples: they performed some traditional dances that drew inspiration from the strutting of peacocks
for all his strutting, for all his claims to have fixed the economy, people are worse off
